languages.text: "Не, он инструктаж прослушал и сунул руку в реактор. Чудом искрой машинных духов не зашибло".
"No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
languages.original_text: "Не, он инструктаж прослушал и сунул руку в реактор. Чудом искрой машинных духов не зашибло".

traits.locale_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
"No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
"No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the Motive Force didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
"No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the Motive Force didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
"No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
"No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."

languages.text: «Qué va, es que no hizo ni caso a las instrucciones y metió la mano en el reactor. No sé cómo no le mataron los espíritus máquina en ese mismo instante».
languages.original_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."

traits.locale_text: «Qué va, es que no hizo ni caso a las instrucciones y metió la mano en el reactor. No sé cómo no le mató la Fuerza Motriz en ese mismo instante».

languages.text: 「いや、仕事前の説明も聞かずに、リアクターに手を挟んだんだよ。どうして機械精霊に殺されなかったかは、分からないがね」
languages.original_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、仕事前の説明も聞かずに、リアクターに手を挟んだんだよ。どうして機械教団に殺されなかったかは、分からないがね」

languages.text: “没有，他根本没听警告事项，直接把手伸进了反应堆里。至于他为什么没被机魂当场电死，我也不清楚。”
languages.original_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."

traits.locale_text: “没有，他根本没听警告事项，直接把手伸进了反应堆里。至于他为什么没被源力当场电死，我也不清楚。”

languages.text: "Nein, er hat beim Briefing nicht zugehört und die Hand in den Reaktor gesteckt. Ich habe keine Ahnung, warum ihn die Maschinengeister nicht augenblicklich getötet habe."
languages.original_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, er hat beim Briefing nicht zugehört und hat die Hand in den Reaktor gesteckt. Ich habe keinen Schimmer, warum ihn die Antriebskraft nicht augenblicklich getötet hat."

languages.text: « Non, il a pas écouté les instructions et il s'est coincé la main dans le réacteur. C'est un miracle que les esprits de la machine ne l'aient pas tué sur le coup. »
languages.original_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."

traits.locale_text: « Non, il a pas écouté les instructions et il s'est coincé la main dans le réacteur. C'est un miracle que la Force Motrice l'ait pas tué sur le coup. »

languages.text: "Hayır, bilgilendirmeyi dinlemedi. Sonra da elini reaktöre sıkıştırdı. Nasıl oldu da makine ruhları onu anında öldürmediler, hiç bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "No, he didn't listen to the briefing and stuck his hand in the reactor. How the machine spirits didn't kill him instantly, I have no idea."
